Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello, <MYNAME>! Have you come to see
me?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. That makes me very happy! ♪ But right
now, I'm in the middle of something. Could you
wait a minute?
<PAGE>
I won't take long. Please, have a seat.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All done! Sorry to keep you waiting.
...Hmm? What's wrong?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that? That's my cherished collection.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, that's the bone of an animal that's said to
have gone extinct ages ago...
<PAGE>
...and this is the feather of a bird so rare, many
believe it to be legendary.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
They're all things I found when I was traveling
around the world looking for rare animals. All of
them are special to me.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd love to tell you more about them...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...But I don't want to talk about something that
would bore you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Since you came all this way to see me, I'd prefer
to talk about things that are interesting to you,
not just to me!
Tell me more about them.
Let's tell scary stories!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You really want to know? Yay! I'm so happy that
you're interested in them! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh... Okay, have a seat so we can take our time
and chat. Oh! But let me go put on some tea
first.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...and that's when Mr. Alligator showed up. He
was...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...so I thought it was a panda. But it turned out
it was just a bear that had been born with a
mottled coat...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT>
Ah! Talking about my favorite animal memories
with my favorite person...
<PAGE>
This was a really super-amazing evening. I had
so much fun! Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. Whenever I'm with you, it always amazes
me just how quickly the time flies.
<PAGE>
I want to talk with you lots and lots more,
though, if I can. In fact, I'd love it if you'd stay
all night to talk!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Heh! Don't worry, I'm just kidding.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know you're a super busy person, <MYNAME>.
I wouldn't want to cause you any trouble or
make you miss work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So instead, how about you come by again later,
at your convenience, and we can talk more!
<PAGE>
Next time, let's talk about your favorite things.
Okay?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You promise? Yay! Let's pinky-swear on it. ♪
<PAGE>
Be careful on your way home, okay,
<MYNAME>? Bye-bye!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? You want to tell scary stories? Er, but I've
never been, um...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...A-all right, if that's what you want to do, I'll
listen closely.
<PAGE>
I'm going to go make a pot of tea first, though,
to help prepare myself. Please have a seat,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>EEEEEK! I-I'm scared already!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_L><MYNAME>, you tell some super scary stories!
My heart is still pounding...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Aww...are you really going home now?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
B-but...after such a frightening tale, I don't think
I'll be able to sleep at all tonight!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>...would you please stay here with
me?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, wait... No, you're right. You really shouldn't.
I...I'll try to get some sleep. G-good night,
<MYNAME>!
